description.value:
When your heart races at the start of a dangerous situation, your aether activates within you, shielding you from the eyes of others. 
If you have any cover or concealment when you make an initiative check, you turn @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.YE63H7VLOHW7NFHO]{Invisible} until the end of your next turn, or until you take an action, cast a spell, or make an attack.
